entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is described as the one who has gray eyes and is whispering to Harry. He is also referred to as 'he' in the text.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one whose forehead Lucius is examining. He is also referred to as 'him' and 'his' in the text.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is described as the one who is being asked by Lucius to come and examine Harry's forehead. He is also referred to as 'he' in the text.

entities.name: scar
entities.description: The scar is mentioned as a possible explanation for what Lucius sees on Harry's forehead.

relationships.description: Lucius examines Harry's forehead to see if he can find anything unusual.
Lucius asks Draco for his opinion on what he sees on Harry's forehead.
